official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to reauthorize the Alternate Routes to Teacher Certification and Licensure program.
short_title: Alternative Routes to Teacher Certification and Licensure Act of 2001

summary.text: Alternative Routes to Teacher Certification and Licensure Act of 2001 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish, as a new title VIII, the Alternate Routes to Teacher Certification and Licensure program. Directs the Secretary of Education to allot grants to States to develop and implement programs for alternative routes to teacher certification or licensure requirements in order to increase the supply of well-qualified elementary school and secondary school teachers, with special emphasis on participation of minority group members.

titles.title: Alternative Routes to Teacher Certification and Licensure Act of 2001
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to reauthorize the Alternate Routes to Teacher Certification and Licensure program.
